text: Three Amigos (stylized as Â¡Three Amigos!) is a 1986 American western comedy movie directed by John Landis and starring Steve Martin, Chevy Chase, Martin Short, Alfonso Arau, Tony Plana, Patrice Martinez, Joe Mantegna, Phil Hartman, Jon Lovitz, Randy Newman. It was distributed by Orion Pictures. == Plot == It is the story of three American silent movie actors (Steve Martin, Chevy Chase, Martin Short) who are mistaken for real heroes by the suffering people of a small Mexican village who are terrorized by a group of bandits led by the chief bandit El Guapo (Alfonso Arau). The actors must find a way to live up to their reputation and defeat the bandits. ==Other websites== * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:1980s Western (genre) movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies about actors Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in Mexico Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies directed by John Landis
